CONTRACT LOGISTICS

Wisebridge offers bespoke contract logistics solutions to meet your specific requirements. We are equipped to handle complex supply chain needs and deliver maximum value through our Single Solution.

Our highly trained team provides value-added services, such as: data-matrix, QR codes, labeling, translation and many others region-specific requirements.

Automatisation solutions

Our contract logistics solutions integrate seamlessly with our air, ocean and road freight services to ensure that your business needs are met in a timely and cost-effective manner.

Our own Warehouse Management System together with robotic full-fulfilment sorting solution capable to operate on 1-piece level.
